[+1]: Journey into the Underworld. [i](Enter the Underworld if you haven't already, then put a damnation counter on it.)[/i]
[-5]: Destroy target permanent.
[-9]: Target player loses 2 life, exiles a card from their hand, and exiles a permanent they control. Repeat this process for each card type among cards in graveyards.

cards.rules_text:
Penance {2}{R}{R}{G}{G}{W}{W} [i](If you cast this for its penance cost, replace all numbers in brackets with the greatest power or toughness among your creatures.)[/i]
For each creature card in your graveyard, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's [b][1][/b]/[b][1][/b] and has haste and lifelink. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

When Leviathan, Heart of Sin enters the battlefield, journey into the Underworld. [i](Enter the Underworld if you haven't already, then put a damnation counter on it.)[/i]
Unless you've journeyed into the Underworld seven or more times, Leviathan is an artifact and isn't a creature. Otherwise, it has flying, indestructible, and “Leviathan's power and toughness are each equal to the number of times you've journeyed into the Underworld.”
You may cast permanent spells with unearth from exile. Spells you cast this way cost an additional “Pay 2 life” to cast.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Balat is liege both great and terrible, astride a pale beast, before whom go trumpets, and all kind of panic and chaos.”

cards.rules_text:
Menace
White spells your opponents cast cost {W} more to cast. The same is true for blue and {U}, black and {B}, red and {R}, and green and {G}.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The slow knife that cuts worlds open, Ghazuz's scheming has now turned to planning his escape from the Underworld.[/i]

Whenever one or more creatures with the greatest power among creatures you control attack, create a token that's a copy of one of those creatures, except it's a black Demon and is tapped and attacking. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of the next end step.

Hellmarch Reaver has vigilance as long as there is a white card in your graveyard or among cards you own in exile. The same is true for ward {1} and blue, menace and black, haste and red, and +1/+1 and green.

Each nonland card in your graveyard that's a creature, an Aura, or that has an activated ability with {T} in its cost has unearth. The unearth cost is equal to its mana cost. [i](Pay the card's mana cost: Return it to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Trample

When Penitent's Plate dies, distribute its counters among up to two target creatures you control.

Flying
When Primal Lorekeeper enters the battlefield, exile up to one creature card and up to one noncreature card from your graveyard. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

Menace
Whenever a permanent card enters your graveyard from anywhere or leaves your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Perfect Hatred.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Protean and formless, the hydras of the Underworld are manifestations of manifold paths to damnation.[/i]
